timeline.message:
chore: add repo licence info

Added Project licence info in Readme to get information about the projects licence at first glance

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            This project is licensed under [Apache Licence 2.0](https://github.com/atharwa-24/camunda-bpm-platform/blob/master/LICENSE)
          
          
            
            The source files in this repository are made available under the [Apache License Version 2.0](./LICENSE).
timeline.author: tmetzke
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -51,9 +47,13 @@ Most of the components that make up the platform can even be completely embedded
 
 ## Contributing
 
-Please see our [contribution guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md).
-
+- Please see our [contribution guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md).
+- Issue Tracker: [Issues](https://app.camunda.com/jira).
 
 ## Tests
 
 To run the tests in this repository, please see our [testing tips and tricks](TESTING.md).
+
+
+## License
+This project is licensed under [Apache Licence 2.0](https://github.com/atharwa-24/camunda-bpm-platform/blob/master/LICENSE)

timeline.bodyText: Let's keep those two around in the list 👍
timeline.author: tmetzke
timeline.diffHunk:

timeline.bodyText: Let's keep it in the main list above
